column12: Arabidopsis thaliana iP-delayed cotyledon senescence transcriptome
column25: Arabidopsis thaliana iP-delayed cotyledon senescence transcriptome
column29: Cytokinins have long been known to delay senescence in detached leaves. Here, we performed RNA-seq analysis to evaluate possible mechanisms of cytokinin-delayed senescence. Cotyledons were excised from 12 day-old Arabidopsis thaliana seedlings and were floated on MES buffer pH 5.7. Buffer was supplemented with either 1uM cytokinin or an equivalent volume (0.1%) DMSO as a vehicle control. Cytokinins tested included iP, iP-7-glucoside, and iP-9-glucoside. The treatment took place over six days in the dark to allow senescence to take place. At the end of the six days, RNA was extracted.
